entity.name: PageBuilderSlideItemLinkUrlInvalidProperty
entity.data: Adding link in both content and outer element is not allowed.

entity.name: PageBuilderSlideItemLinkUrlInvalidWidgetProperty
entity.data: Adding link in outer element and widget in content is not allowed.

entity.name: PageBuilderSlideItemMessageInvalidProperty
entity.data: Adding link in both content and outer element is not allowed.

We are unable to support links within the content field whilst having a link set on the content type. Please remove the content type link if you'd like to set a link within the content. We will automatically remove the links within the content field.

entity.name: PageBuilderSlideItemMessageInvalidWidgetProperty
entity.data: Adding widget in content and link in outer element is not allowed.

We are unable to support widget within the content field whilst having a link set on the content type. Please remove the content type link if you'd like to set a widget within the content. We will automatically remove the widget within the content field.
